Jeff Bezos Tribute Page

Jeff Bezos is most known for starting and being the CEO of the online company named Amazon. But, he was not always rich and famous. Below you will see some "highlights" of his life.

Impressive accomplishments of Jeff Bezos

    1964 - Jeff Bezos was born
  • 1968 - Adopted by Miguel Bezos
  • 1982 - Graduate valedictorian at Miami's Palmetto Senior High
  • 1986 - Graduates at Princeton University with 2 degrees. One in computer science and the other in electrical engineering
  • 1990 - Joins Wallstreet Quantative hedge fund D.E. Shaw & Co. He leaves 4 years later
  • 1995 - Bezos starts amazon and his first employee send out links for Amazon.com beta website
  • 1998-2000 - Amazon raises 2.2 billion dollars in debt
  • 2000 - Named Time Magizines Man of the Year
  • 2007 - Introduces "Kindle" to the world
  • 2013 - Buys The Washington Post newspaper for $250
Jeff Bezos Biography
